channel.title: GamersEvo Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "GamersEvo Village" - Lol how long has this been here?

item.title: GamersEvo Village
item.content:encoded:
I usually don't advertise other villages on other forums, but I figure if there is a special section it won't hurt to put this out there.

We are the village that more or less splintered off of the Wiki. It was planned the whole time with Uzuki. However, if me saying that we are a splinter group gets your attention then :D.

Point is come here and enjoy a calm environment with fun and a fast track to WIN.
